The superstar Hollywood favorite Will Smith (Men In Black / Indepemdence Day) Gene Hackman shines with the winner of two Academy Awards (The Unforgiven / Red Tide), this thriller full of suspense and lots of action coupled with a perfect technology! Claytin Robert Dean (Smith), a successful lawyer in Washington, unexpectedly receives a video that shows the link between a high-ranking official of the National Security Agency (Oscar winner Jon Voight) to a political murder! 1 hour for another Dean's life crumbles and he becomes a constant target for the more dangerous team and trained government. Stay tuned for a string of spectacular scenes, while Dean fights to save his life and prove his innocence ... Before it's too late!
